artisans_tools.name: Alchemist's Supplies
artisans_tools.description: A set of tools used to create potions, elixirs, and chemical concoctions. These include glass beakers, flasks, and a mortar and pestle.
artisans_tools.use: Craft potions, identify chemical substances, or create alchemical items such as acid or alchemist’s fire.

artisans_tools.name: Brewer's Supplies
artisans_tools.description: Used to brew alcoholic drinks like beer, ale, or mead. It includes a mash tub, brewing equipment, and fermentation vessels.
artisans_tools.use: Craft beverages, detect poison in drinks, or gain favor with tavern owners and patrons through high-quality brews.

artisans_tools.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
artisans_tools.description: A set of high-quality writing tools, including ink, quills, and parchment, used to create beautiful and precise writing.
artisans_tools.use: Craft scrolls, forge documents, or create attractive written works that impress nobles or scholars.

artisans_tools.name: Carpenter's Tools
artisans_tools.description: Tools such as hammers, saws, nails, and chisels used to construct or repair wooden structures like buildings, ships, or furniture.
artisans_tools.use: Repair wooden objects, build structures, or identify structural weaknesses.

artisans_tools.name: Cartographer's Tools
artisans_tools.description: This set includes maps, parchment, quills, and compasses used to create accurate maps and charts.
artisans_tools.use: Create maps, plot courses through unfamiliar terrain, or decipher old maps and charts.

artisans_tools.name: Cobbler's Tools
artisans_tools.description: Tools for making and repairing shoes, including a knife, thread, and a small hammer.
artisans_tools.use: Craft or repair footwear, or identify the origin of boots or footprints.

artisans_tools.name: Cook's Utensils
artisans_tools.description: A set of cooking tools, including pots, pans, knives, and spices.
artisans_tools.use: Prepare meals, gain favor by cooking delicious food, or identify poisoned or spoiled food.

artisans_tools.name: Glassblower's Tools
artisans_tools.description: A collection of tools used to shape and craft glass, including a blowpipe, molds, and a small furnace.
artisans_tools.use: Craft glass objects like bottles or ornaments, or repair damaged glass items.

artisans_tools.name: Jeweler's Tools
artisans_tools.description: Tools such as a jeweler's loupe, files, and pliers, used to create or repair jewelry and appraise gemstones.
artisans_tools.use: Craft or repair jewelry, identify or appraise gems and precious items, or detect fake jewelry.

artisans_tools.name: Leatherworker's Tools
artisans_tools.description: A set of tools for crafting leather items, including needles, thread, and a small knife.
artisans_tools.use: Craft or repair leather armor, saddles, or other leather goods.

artisans_tools.name: Mason's Tools
artisans_tools.description: Tools such as hammers, chisels, and trowels used to work with stone.
artisans_tools.use: Build or repair stone structures, identify weaknesses in stonework, or detect secret doors in stone walls.

artisans_tools.name: Painter's Supplies
artisans_tools.description: A set of tools for painting, including brushes, pigments, and easels.
artisans_tools.use: Create paintings, forge artworks, or use art as a means of persuasion or storytelling.

artisans_tools.name: Potter's Tools
artisans_tools.description: A collection of tools for shaping and baking clay, such as a potter’s wheel, clay, and a kiln.
artisans_tools.use: Craft or repair ceramic objects, such as bowls or vases.

artisans_tools.name: Smith's Tools
artisans_tools.description: A set of tools used by blacksmiths, including hammers, tongs, and an anvil.
artisans_tools.use: Craft or repair metal items, including weapons, armor, and tools.

artisans_tools.name: Tinker's Tools
artisans_tools.description: Tools for repairing or crafting small, intricate items, such as gears, clocks, and mechanical objects.
artisans_tools.use: Repair mechanical devices or craft small contraptions like traps or locks.

artisans_tools.name: Weaver's Tools
artisans_tools.description: A set of tools including a loom and thread, used to create fabric and cloth objects.
artisans_tools.use: Craft or repair clothing, identify fabrics, or produce high-quality textiles for trade.

artisans_tools.name: Woodcarver's Tools
artisans_tools.description: A set of knives and chisels used to carve wood into artistic or functional objects.
artisans_tools.use: Create sculptures, repair wooden items, or carve runes or messages into wood.
